Voiceover

Professional voice for your videos. Ads, spots, e-learning.

Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly will I receive the recording?

I deliver most orders within 24 hours. If it's urgent, I can even do it within a few hours.

Can I hear samples?

Yes! On this page you will find audio samples from my projects (Prazdroj, ƒåSOB, Oreo).

What formats do you deliver?

MP3, WAV, or any format you need. Always in high quality.

Can you do dubbing too?

Yes, I also do dubbing for videos, e-learning courses, or animations.
